ComicInfo.Summary: Three Snake Leaves: Annette is dying of cancer, but Ben isn't ready to let her go. While performing experiments with snakes to produce a serum he hopes will save Annette's life, Belinda loans him a book about the Three Snake Leaves. In the story, Wilhelm will do anything to restore Zahra's life. Both in the story and in Ben's life, the men discover that restoring their wives back to health has horrible consequences.
ComicInfo.Title: Three Snake Leaves
